import React from "react" import { MapContainer as LeafletMap, TileLayer } from "react-leaflet" import {showDataOnMap} from "./util.js" import ChangeView from "./ChangeView.js" import "./Map.css" function Map(props) { return (

{props.center}

{showDataOnMap(props.countries, "cases")}
) } export default Map //

{props.center[0]} {props.center[1]}
